title: Scott Pilgrim's Precious Little Life
description: Scott Pilgrim's life is totally sweet. He's 23 years old, he's in a rock band, he's 'between jobs', and he's dating a cute high school girl. Nothing could possibly go wrong, unless a mind-blowing, fashionable, rollerblading delivery girl named Ramona Flowers starts cruising through his dreams and sailing by him at parties.
author: Bryan Lee O'Malley
